name: SnackMix 400
description: The corn grits (SnackMix 400) from Milh√£o provides high industrial performance in the production of snacks. It has a more intense orange color, due to the greater amount of carotenoids present in Flint corn. Its particle size is well defined and coarser for single screw extruders (single screw). The ingredient can also be used in the production of flakes, cereals and purchased by mills and packers.
